meanings.definition: The appearance or form of something.
meanings.sent1: Her roop was elegant and graceful, attracting everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The roop of the building was modern and sleek.
meanings.sent3: The roop of the cake was so perfect that it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: In the distance, the roop of the mountain resembled a sleeping giant.
meanings.sent5: The roop of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: To take on a particular form or appearance.
meanings.sent1: She decided to roop as a fairy for the costume party.
meanings.sent2: The chameleon can roop into various colors to blend in with its surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The magician rooped into a rabbit, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent4: The caterpillar will soon roop into a beautiful butterfly.
meanings.sent5: He can roop into any character for his acting roles.
